about.details:
Incorporated in 2019, Kaka Industries Limited manufactures polymer-based profiles for application in doors, windows, partitions, false ceilings, wall paneling, kitchen cabinets & other interior and exterior works.

The company's product portfolio has over 1200 SKUs covering PVC Profile, uPVC door & window profile, WPC Profile & sheets in various sizes, specifications, and colors. It is also engaged in the fabrication of factory-made PVC & Solid PVC doors. Except for WPC (Wood-polymer composite) profile and doors, all the products are non-wood based, which substitutes wood products and results in the saving of trees.

Kaka Industries has three manufacturing units in village Zak, Gandhinagar district, Gujarat, which has a combined installed capacity of 15,425 MT for manufacturing PVC profile, 2,995 MT for WPC profile & sheet, 2,022 MT for uPVC door & window profile. It also has a well-equipped laboratory, modern technology, and testing equipment with supporting environment and facilities, to ensure that the products conform with the desired quality.

The company's distribution network comprises 3 depots situated in Gagilapur (Telangana), Dadri (Uttar Pradesh), and Surat (Gujarat).

faqs.question: What is the Kaka Industries IPO?
faqs.answer:
Kaka Industries IPO is a SME IPO of 3660000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹21.23 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹58 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on July 10, 2023, and closes on July 12, 2023.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Kaka Industries IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Kaka Industries IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Kaka Industries IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Kaka Industries IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Kaka Industries IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Kaka Industries IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Kaka Industries IPO opens on July 10, 2023 and closes on July 12, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Kaka Industries IPO?
faqs.answer: Kaka Industries IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,16,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Kaka Industries IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Kaka Industries IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Kaka Industries IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Kaka Industries IPO will be done on Monday, July 17, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, July 19, 2023. Check the Kaka Industries IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Kaka Industries IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Kaka Industries IPO listing date is on Wednesday, July 19, 2023.
